lead_paragraph: A video that showed a man being arrested and zipped into a ventilated bag has drawn attention for what was called a “dehumanizing” tactic.

headline.print_headline: Police Tactic Criticized After Video of Arrest With Restraint Bag
headline.main: New York Police Criticized for Using Restraining Bag in Arrest

snippet: A video that showed a man being arrested and zipped into a ventilated bag has drawn attention for what was called a “dehumanizing” tactic.
abstract: New York Police Dept fields criticism over its use of ventilated mesh body bags as method of restraining people deemed to be emotionally disturbed, triggered by bystander video of arrest on Manhattan sidewalk; mental health advocates have registered complaints about use of such restraints, but NYPD officials say bags have been safely employed for 25 years and are only used by highly trained members of Emergency Service Units.
